notes_display: In Historical Sketches of the Paper Currency of the American Colonies by Henry Phillips, Jr. (1865). Given to Dr. Jesse C. Green in 1890. Leaf 56BN.
issue_place_s: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States of America
issue_obverse_legend_s: Three Pence. THIS BILL by Law shall pass CURRENT for Three Pence, within the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, according to an Act of the GENERAL ASSEMBLY, passed at Philadelphia, the 16th day of March, Anno Domini one thousand seven hundred and eighty five. Three Pence.
issue_reverse_legend_s: Three Pence. | To Counterfeit is Death. | PHILADELPHIA: Printed by FRANCIS BAILEY.
